snippet: President Obama, who has had a sometimes rocky relationship with unions, will address the “Summit on Worker Voice” on Wednesday, an effort to give unions, organizers and some businesses a platform to discuss wages and other issues.
abstract: President Obama, who has had a sometimes rocky relationship with unions, will address the “Summit on Worker Voice” on Wednesday, an effort to give unions, organizers and some businesses a platform to discuss wages and other issues.

headline.main: Obama to Host Workers’ Voice Summit at White House
